payload.name: sat-smt
payload.title: SAT/SMT: encode hard invariants as satisfiable constraints
payload.formal: constraints are boolean/first-order; solver finds model or proves UNSAT.
payload.apm2_mapping: deployment and security policy should be constraints, not ad-hoc checks: “no tool call with net=true unless capability X,” “no merge unless evidence bundle contains Y,” “no downgrade of classification.” Where possible, compile policy into SAT/SMT for decidability and audit.
